name: t200logs-extension
description: Extension to make diagnosing Teams logs much easier. Open this extension in a folder containing Teams logs and it will combine them into a single view with filtering and visual hints.

commands.title: Toggles readable dates to log viewer
Reset all data and reopen log viewer
Toggles visual hints in log viewer

t200logs.showWelcomeMessage.markdownDescription: Show a welcome message when opening the log viewer with an option to open the extension logs.

t200logs.keywords.filter.markdownDescription:
You can add your own custom predefined keyword here using the following format: `{"keyword": "YOUR_KEYWORD", "isChecked": true}`. These will be loaded on startup and can be toggled on and off in the log viewer. You can enable or disable the default keywords by setting the `isChecked` property.

 - `keyword`: The keyword to filter. This can be a regular expression
 - `isChecked`: Whether the filter should be enabled by default.

t200logs.keywords.highlights.markdownDescription:
You can add your own custom predefined keyword highlights here using the following format: `{"keyword": "YOUR_KEYWORD", "color": "#FF0000", "isChecked": false}`. These will be loaded on startup and can be toggled on and off in the log viewer.

- `keyword`: The keyword to highlight. This can be a regular expression
- `color`: The color to use for highlighting
- `isChecked`: Whether the highlight should be enabled by default
